translation.en: [man in French] I think the word captain is…
translation.it: Per me, la parola capitano indica

translation.en: Is above all a feeling of pride.
[man in Portuguese] You give that responsibility only to people you trust.
translation.it: È una responsabilità data solo a persone di cui ci si fida.

translation.en: [man in Croatian] You need to be your manager's right hand.
[man in Arabic] A good player does not always make a good leader or captain.
translation.it: Un buon giocatore non è sempre un buon leader o un buon capitano.

translation.en: [man 1 in English] It's the best thing that can happen to anyone.
translation.it: È la cosa migliore che possa capitare.

translation.en: [man 2] Wearing the captain band, you can't show fear. You can't show nerves.
translation.it: Con la fascia da capitano, non puoi mostrare paura, nervosismo.

translation.en: Silencing them is gonna feel good, eh?
I work hard for you. You work hard for me.
translation.it: Io m'impegno per voi, voi per me.

translation.en: [Blake] We wanna go to the World Cup.
[Maatouk in Arabic] Everyone's counting on us.
[Modrić in Croatian] It will be emotional and difficult.
[Aubameyang in French] It's a whole country behind you.
translation.it: C'è un intero Paese dietro di te.

translation.en: -[in Jamaican Patois] Think I like losing? -[in Croatian] Clear it.
translation.it: Credi che ami perdere? Calciala via.

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] I am getting goosebumps.
translation.it: Mi sta venendo la pelle d'oca.

translation.en: We're going to Qatar!
[Modrić in Croatian] I don't like to talk about myself as if I'm bragging,
but I always had the feeling I was a leader.
translation.it: ma ho sempre saputo di essere un leader.

translation.en: [man 1 in French] Good evening, everyone.
After a busy night of African qualifiers for the World Cup 2022 in Qatar…
translation.it: Dopo un'intensa serata di qualificazioni per i Mondiali 2022 in Qatar…

translation.en: …we're back focusing on the Panthers of Gabon
translation.it: Torniamo a concentrarci sulle Pantere del Gabon

translation.en: whose campaign has just gotten underway against Libya.
translation.it: di cui è appena iniziata la campagna contro la Libia.

translation.en: Gabon scored first.
[man 2] It's a nice combination from Gabon.
And it's in off the post.
The Gabonese defense was all over the place.
translation.it: La difesa del Gabon era ovunque.

translation.en: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang with the strike!
Just a few seconds left in this game.
A cross into the box. The header!
translation.it: Una cross in mezzo. Colpo di testa!

translation.en: And it's Libya in the final minute
translation.it: Ed è la Libia che prende il comando

translation.en: that take the lead.
Gabon crack at the end of the game.
translation.it: Il Gabon cede a fine partita.

translation.en: [reporter] It was a big upset. Libya gaining a shock win.
translation.it: È stato sconvolgente che la Libia abbia vinto.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was pissed off.
We were all disappointed.
It's our fault.
It's not even the opponent. It's us.
I don't want to miss out.
[reporter] Will Aubameyang ever get the chance to play at a World Cup?
translation.it: Aubameyang avrà mai la possibilità di giocare ai Mondiali?

translation.en: For sure he belongs on that stage, but do Gabon?
translation.it: Di sicuro appartiene a quella scena… CENTRO DI ALLENAMENTO DEL GABON …ma il Gabon?

translation.en: [Aubameyang] I was born in France, but I grew up like an African.
translation.it: Sono nato in Francia, ma sono cresciuto da africano.

translation.en: People ask me the question, "Why?"
"Why did you choose Gabon?"
My father.
The first memory in my head,
I was very small.
My father was playing.
He scored a goal.
[commentator] Oh, the goal of Aubame!
Wow. It was incredible how many people were cheering.
translation.it: Era incredibile, tanta gente che tifava.

translation.en: I was thinking, "What's going on?"
It was a very powerful moment.
We scored some goals tonight, which felt good for the team.
translation.it: Stasera abbiamo segnato dei goal, è stato un bene per la squadra.

translation.en: The most important thing is winning.
translation.it: La cosa più importante è vincere.

translation.en: I think from that point on,
he was my role model.
[man] I like fashion, so does Pierre-Emerick.
translation.it: Mi piace la moda e anche a Pierre-Emerick.

translation.en: In the evening, when you put on something like this.
translation.it: La sera, quando indossi qualcosa del genere…

translation.en: Something like this. Whoo!
When he sees this, Pierre-Emerick, he'll want to steal it from me.
translation.it: Quando lo vedrà, Pierre-Emerick vorrà rubarmelo.

translation.en: Well, no stealing.
It's for me. [laughs]
I realized he had something when he was about five years old.
translation.it: Ho capito che era speciale quando aveva cinque anni.

translation.en: We started playing football, and I had the ball.
translation.it: Avevamo iniziato a giocare a calcio e io avevo la palla.

translation.en: Very quickly, he takes the ball, accelerates, and shoots.
translation.it: In un attimo, prende la palla, accelera e tira.

translation.en: I said, "Wow. He has something."
As I'd already been a professional footballer,
translation.it: Dato che ero stato un calciatore professionista,

translation.en: I had seen a lot of physical duels.
[commentator 1] Aubame.
[laughs] Playing with my father…
[commentator 2] Look at Aubame. Looking a little like Michael Jackson.
translation.it: Guardate Aubame. Somiglia un po' a Michael Jackson.

translation.en: …it was hard.
We did a lot of one-on-ones.
There were no fouls, so it was very physical. [laughs]
translation.it: Non c'erano falli, era molto fisico.

translation.en: [man] His father educated him according to the morals of a patrilineal society
translation.it: Suo padre lo ha educato secondo la morale di una società patrilineare perché appartiene alla tribù Fang.

translation.en: because he belongs to the Fang tribe.
translation.it: di una società patrilineare perché appartiene alla tribù Fang.

translation.en: It is a society where the concept of the father is very strong
translation.it: È una società in cui il concetto di padre è molto forte

translation.en: with extremely rigorous values.
Maybe it was those values, those cultural elements,
translation.it: Forse sono quei valori, quegli elementi culturali,

translation.en: that led him to make the choices he made.
translation.it: che lo hanno portato a fare le sue scelte.

translation.en: -He'd fall, but we kept playing. -"Never complain."
translation.it: - Cadeva, ma continuavamo a giocare. - "Mai lamentarsi."

translation.en: [Pierre-François] You couldn't say, "That's wrong."
If you say that, I get mad.
"Never complain. Get back up and continue."
It was an African education.
The hard way,
but in France.
So…
-You see what you did? So good. -[laughing]
translation.it: Hai visto cos'hai fatto? Molto bene.

translation.en: So, so good.
[Aubameyang] My dad was very hard on me,
translation.it: Mio padre era molto duro con me,

translation.en: but that's what makes me strong today.
translation.it: ma è questo che mi rende forte oggi.

translation.en: [Pierre-François] When I watched him play,
I could only go now and again, and I would turn up by surprise.
translation.it: potevo andare ogni tanto, mi presentavo a sorpresa.

translation.en: I never celebrated his goals.
translation.it: Non festeggiavo mai i suoi goal.

translation.en: When he did score, he would look to me, and I'd just stay like this.
translation.it: Quando segnava, mi guardava e io restavo così.

translation.en: All the parents are screaming, and I was like this.
translation.it: Tutti i genitori urlavano e io ero così.

translation.en: The FA Cup final.
That's the captain's armband that he wore when he won the FA Cup.
translation.it: È la fascia di capitano che ha indossato quando ha vinto la Coppa d'Inghilterra.

translation.en: Voilà.
And this is the shirt that won that.
translation.it: E questa è la maglia con cui ha vinto.

translation.en: So here we have,
"This is for you."
Also for me, and here,
"I love you."
How can you not be proud?
Voilà.
[Tonda] He could have been a world champion with the French team,
translation.it: Avrebbe potuto essere campione del mondo con la squadra francese,

translation.en: but his father is Gabonese.
It was such an inspiration for me to follow in his footsteps.
translation.it: È stata un'ispirazione, per me, seguire le sue orme.

translation.en: Whether it is in life or on the pitch.
translation.it: Che sia nella vita o in campo.

translation.en: Even if we get knocked down,
we get back up and we keep going.
We're playing for something extraordinary in the end.
Qualifying for the World Cup, this has never happened for Gabon,
translation.it: Le qualificazioni per i Mondiali, mai raggiunte dal Gabon,

translation.en: and, of course, my father.
Yeah, it pisses me off that we didn't get a result.
translation.it: Sono arrabbiato per non aver vinto.

translation.en: The night before, we were all on the same page.
translation.it: La sera prima eravamo tutti sulla stessa lunghezza d'onda.

translation.en: [Pierre-François] We got frustrated. We got frustrated.
We were all over the place, but ultimately, it's up to us.
translation.it: Eravamo troppo sparsi, ma, alla fine, dipende da noi.

translation.en: It was our fault.
We should be difficult to get past.
We've got to be honest. We didn't do that well enough.
translation.it: Dobbiamo essere onesti. Non siamo stati abbastanza bravi.

translation.en: Look, we've got a match coming up. We just need to put in the practice.
translation.it: Abbiamo una partita in arrivo. Dobbiamo solo allenarci.

translation.en: [Tonda] Aubameyang, obviously, is the superstar.
He is the bearer of the Gabonese flag.
If he manages to motivate his young teammates,
translation.it: Se riesce a motivare i suoi giovani compagni,

translation.en: if he can give them enough motivation to qualify,
translation.it: se riesce a dare loro la motivazione necessaria,

translation.en: I think it will be the best gift he will give to his country.
translation.it: sarà il miglior regalo che farà al suo Paese.

translation.en: [announcer in English] The best player of the year,
[Modrić in Croatian] All those awards I've received, it's just phenomenal.
translation.it: Tutti quei premi che ho ricevuto sono fenomenali.

translation.en: [man] For the last ten years, Ronaldo and Messi shared the Ballon d'Or.
translation.it: Negli ultimi dieci anni, Ronaldo e Messi hanno condiviso il Pallone d'Oro.

translation.en: [man] It's you!
[Modrić in Croatian] There's a sadness there, at least for me.
translation.it: Ma c'è una certa tristezza, almeno per me.

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] I think about that final every day.
translation.it: Penso a quella finale ogni giorno.

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It still has a hold on me.
[in English] ♪ La-la-la-la-la-la, la-la ♪
♪ I've had my share of fame ♪
translation.it: LA CROAZIA HA RAGGIUNTO LA FINALE DEI MONDIALI 2018. IL CAPITANO MODRIĆ HA VINTO IL PREMIO COME MIGLIOR GIOCATORE DEL TORNEO.

translation.en: ♪ You know my name ♪
translation.it: IL CAPITANO MODRIĆ HA VINTO IL PREMIO COME MIGLIOR GIOCATORE DEL TORNEO.

translation.en: [in Croatian] Let me see how you receive it.
Let's do keepie uppies, the three of us.
Show me some of your tricks.
You're pretty good at this.
The best things never come easy.
translation.it: Le cose migliori non sono mai facili.

translation.en: Throughout my life and career,
nothing has come easy to me.
translation.it: non mi hanno mai regalato nulla.

translation.en: First.
[man] Luka.
[Modrić] I don't like to talk about it…
…the thing that has marked me for life.
translation.it: della cosa che mi ha segnato per sempre.

translation.en: I was small, very small.
I remember some things.
I still remember my grandfather very well.
He was a kind of protector for me.
translation.it: Era una specie di protettore per me.

translation.en: If I'd been naughty with my mom and dad, he would be there to defend me.
translation.it: Se mi comportavo male con mia madre e mio padre, lui mi difendeva.

translation.en: He took me everywhere with him.
There were a lot of animals, and he was with them around the clock.
translation.it: C'erano molti animali e lui era sempre con loro.

translation.en: So when he would take them to graze, he would take me too.
translation.it: Quando li portava a pascolare, portava anche me.

translation.en: I didn't go to kindergarten.
I was up at my grandparents' house.
That's where I lived.
I have really lovely memories.
A carefree childhood until…
To be honest, I don't even like to think about this.
translation.it: A essere sincero, non mi piace neanche pensarci.

translation.en: I was very young.
That's what stayed with me the most from my childhood.
translation.it: È quello che mi è rimasto della mia infanzia.

translation.en: Although I don't like… I don't like to talk about it.
translation.it: Anche se non mi piace parlarne.

translation.en: We had to escape from our home
translation.it: Siamo dovuti scappare dalle nostre case

translation.en: and go take refuge in hotels.
[Oštrić] We spent six years here.
Luka lived on the third floor, and I lived on the first floor.
translation.it: Luka viveva al terzo piano e io al primo.

translation.en: [Modrić] It wasn't easy to live at that time.
translation.it: Non era facile vivere in quel periodo.

translation.en: You hear those sirens, those bombs dropping, the missiles.
translation.it: Senti le sirene, le bombe che cadono, i missili.

translation.en: [Oštrić] It's impossible not to feel fear when that's going on.
[Modrić] When I look at these childhood pictures, I'm always with a ball.
translation.it: Quando guardo queste foto d'infanzia, ho sempre un pallone.

translation.en: You can immediately see
translation.it: Si vede subito che il calcio giocherà

translation.en: that the ball is going to play an important role in my life.
translation.it: Si vede subito che il calcio giocherà un ruolo importante nella mia vita.

translation.en: Football was definitely a way out
translation.it: Il calcio era una via di fuga

translation.en: of everything that was going on around us.
translation.it: da tutto ciò che accadeva intorno a noi.

translation.en: We'd use two stones as goalposts
translation.it: Usavamo due pietre come pali della porta

translation.en: at both ends of the parking lot.
[Modrić] And that's how it all started.
On the tarmac in front of the hotel…
where you got hit and pushed around.
translation.it: dove ti colpivano e ti spingevano.

translation.en: I was amongst the smaller kids.
There was no complaining or crying. You would move on and fight for yourself.
translation.it: Non mi lamentavo né piangevo. Andavo avanti lottando per me stesso.

translation.en: I was named after my grandfather.
translation.it: Porto il nome di mio nonno.

translation.en: I'm sad that he didn't get to see… at least some of what I've achieved.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che non abbia visto almeno in parte ciò che ho raggiunto.

translation.en: But certainly, he's up there looking down on me, cheering me on.
translation.it: Ma di certo è lassù a guardarmi, a fare il tifo per me.

translation.en: And I'm sure he's proud of me.
[Blake in English] We wanna go to the World Cup. We haven't been there since '98.
translation.it: Vogliamo andare ai Mondiali. Non ci andiamo dal '98.

translation.en: [commentator] Victory in Jamaica.
Jamaica has advanced to France '98.
[Blake in English] I can't even start to imagine,
how would it feel for the nation, for the players…
translation.it: come sarebbe per la nazione, per i giocatori…

translation.en: [all in Jamaican Patois] We will do!
[Blake in English] …and for me as a captain to be going to the World Cup.
translation.it: E per me, come capitano, andare ai Mondiali.

translation.en: What a moment that would be.
What a moment.
[man] When we qualified in 1998,
it was the biggest thing to happen in Jamaica since independence.
translation.it: è stata la cosa più grande successa dall'indipendenza.

translation.en: They declared a national holiday.
[woman] Results have to improve if we're going to qualify this time.
translation.it: I risultati devono migliorare se vogliamo qualificarci.

translation.en: One game, one defeat, and the Reggae Boyz are bottom of the group.
translation.it: Una partita, una sconfitta e i Reggae Boyz saranno gli ultimi.

translation.en: [in Jamaican Patois] '98-- World Cup '98, I was eight.
translation.it: Per i Mondiali del '98, avevo otto anni.

translation.en: You were eight? I wasn't even seven then.
translation.it: Otto anni? Io non ne avevo nemmeno sette.

translation.en: -You were six. -Let's work it out.
translation.it: - Avevi sei anni. - Facciamo i conti.

translation.en: -I'm 1990. When were you born? '92? -'94.
translation.it: Sono del 1990. Quando sei nato? Nel '92? - Nel '94. - Sei del '94?

translation.en: You are '94?
In 1998, you were four. You're a baby.
translation.it: Nel 1998 avevi quattro anni. Sei un bambino.

translation.en: You were really young, so you probably can't remember that.
translation.it: Eri piccolo, quindi forse non lo ricordi.

translation.en: You're DeAndre's age.
I was eight, and I can't even remember much.
translation.it: Avevo otto anni e non ricordo molto.

translation.en: Jamaica used to have one of the best, uh, World Cup songs.
translation.it: La Giamaica aveva una delle migliori canzoni dei Mondiali.

translation.en: -♪ Whoa, whoa, whoa ♪ -Yes.
The song's really hard, ya know?
♪ Rise up ♪
-[laughs] -I…
♪ Stand and take your place ♪
translation.it: Alzati e prendi il tuo posto

translation.en: Yes. Yes.
[in English] Winning bringing healing to a nation because you know what it does?
translation.it: Vincere guarisce una nazione. Sai cosa fa? Avvicina le persone.

translation.en: It brings the people together.
translation.it: Sai cosa fa? Avvicina le persone.

translation.en: It unifies them, even if it's for one moment.
translation.it: Le unisce, anche se solo per un momento.

translation.en: It's like, when they win, we all win.
And when they lose, we all lose.
♪ Your journey has just begun ♪
-♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Rise up ♪ -♪ Stand like the brave ♪ -♪ Oh yeah ♪
[Blake] We have a great group,
but I don't think the group understands yet
translation.it: ma non credo che capisca ancora

translation.en: what it's gonna take to get to a World Cup.
translation.it: cosa serve per arrivare ai Mondiali.

translation.en: It's something that I've detected. As a leader, I have to fix.
translation.it: È una cosa che ho scoperto da leader e che devo sistemare.

translation.en: If we feel like because we have talent we won't have to work,
translation.it: Se sentiamo di non dover lavorare perché abbiamo talento,

translation.en: we're gonna have a problem.
We have pride for our country. We have pride for our athletes
translation.it: Siamo orgogliosi del nostro Paese. Siamo orgogliosi dei nostri atleti

translation.en: who go out there and actually do their best.
And we know most of them don't come back to no big accolades.
translation.it: E sappiamo che molti non tornano con grandi premi.

translation.en: [Blake] It's one of the most talented groups we've ever had. But if you don't fit the system
translation.it: È uno dei nostri gruppi più talentuosi. Ma se non ti adatti al sistema,

translation.en: or you're not in with what we're about, then I don't think we need you.
translation.it: o non sei d'accordo, allora non abbiamo bisogno di te.

translation.en: I would describe this current team as, um,
a mixture of English and Jamaican-born players.
translation.it: come un misto di giocatori inglesi e giamaicani.

translation.en: We have 23 guys coming in.
Twenty-three different backgrounds and 23 different egos.
It's hard.
[in Jamaican Patois] This way.
When we have the next one, if you can, and there's nothing on the left,
translation.it: Quando arriva la prossima, se puoi e non c'è niente a sinistra,

translation.en: you can pull back and you can press out again.
translation.it: puoi farti indietro e spingere di nuovo.

translation.en: [Blake in English] I wanna win. And, you know,
if I sense that the unity is not there, you know,
translation.it: E se percepisco che non c'è coesione,

translation.en: I tend to get really worried.
[manager] That's it. Let us pray.
As we carry the hopes and dreams of our people,
translation.it: Mentre alimentiamo sogni e speranze della nostra gente,

translation.en: let us understand that our service is first and foremost to our people.
translation.it: facci capire che siamo, prima di tutto, al servizio del nostro popolo.

translation.en: [Blake] You're not gonna be able to beat a good team
translation.it: Non si può battere una buona squadra

translation.en: if you're not together.
Where we are weak, let us be strong.
That we will overcome
the many rivers we have to cross.
[man 1 in French] Gabon against Egypt, an important match.
translation.it: Gabon contro Egitto, una partita importante.

translation.en: [man 2] Aubameyang in Franceville against Salah. I would never have imagined that.
translation.it: Aubameyang a Franceville contro Salah, non l'avrei mai immaginato.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.
[man 2] The cream of African football.
[Aubameyang] Mohamed Salah… He's a very nice person.
We have a very good relationship,
but it's over.
[man 3] We hope national icon Aubameyang can lead us to victory.
translation.it: Speriamo che Aubameyang ci porti alla vittoria.

translation.en: [player] Come, look!
[Pierre-François] Football,
it is a religion for the Gabonese.
translation.it: è una religione per i gabonesi.

translation.en: [player] Yes, that's it!
Football connects ethnicities and communities
translation.it: Il calcio unisce etnie e comunità

translation.en: because it transcends.
[player] There!
[Tonda] It makes people forget a lot.
If you have problems, you forget them
translation.it: Se hai problemi, te li scordi

translation.en: because the national team is playing.
[reporter 1] Everyone's predicting a win for the Panthers. Are we being too optimistic?
translation.it: Tutti pronosticano una vittoria per le Pantere. Siamo troppo ottimisti?

translation.en: [reporter 2] It's patriotism that is overshadowing realism ahead of this match.
translation.it: È il patriottismo a mettere in ombra il realismo.

translation.en: This moment of fusion in the body of the nation
translation.it: Questo momento di fusione nel corpo della nazione

translation.en: takes place through the name Aubameyang
because he is the embodiment of the nation.
[Aubameyang] The people of Gabon are very welcoming.
translation.it: La gente del Gabon è molto accogliente.

translation.en: There is a solidarity.
I want to show them that I will do anything for the team.
translation.it: Mostrerò loro che farò di tutto per la squadra.

translation.en: That they can count on me. I'm the captain of Gabon.
translation.it: Possono contare su di me. Sono il capitano del Gabon.

translation.en: Representing Africa…
That's why I'm here.
[reporter 1 in English] Greetings, football family. Happy World Cup qualifiers.
translation.it: Saluti, famiglia del calcio. Buone qualificazioni ai Mondiali.

translation.en: We have got big problems with the Jamaican national team right now.
translation.it: Abbiamo grossi problemi con la nazionale giamaicana.

translation.en: [reporter 2] We've gambled on some new players who have only just qualified to play for Jamaica.
translation.it: Abbiamo scommesso su nuovi giocatori che si sono appena qualificati.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Throwing players together doesn't really work.
translation.it: Mettere i giocatori insieme non funziona.

translation.en: You have to feel for Andre Blake,
captain of a side who have barely trained together.
translation.it: capitano di una squadra che si è allenata poco.

translation.en: [Blake] You guys ready to sing later?
[player] I already sang.
[Blake] When new players come in, they have to sing a song.
translation.it: I nuovi giocatori devono cantare una canzone.

translation.en: That's kind of a way to come together collectively
translation.it: È un modo per riunirsi insieme

translation.en: and to just have some fun.
Tonight, big stage show.
[Marley] Music is so important to sports, you know?
translation.it: La musica è importante per lo sport.

translation.en: It's like it kinda… it kinda goes hand in hand.
[player 1] Roofe's ready.
[Roofe] Roofe's not ready, fam.
Roofe says he's opening the show.
[Blake] For me, unity is one of the most important things.
translation.it: L'unità è una delle sfide più importanti.

translation.en: Sometimes you can tell when that's not there.
translation.it: A volte si capisce quando non c'è.

translation.en: Like I said, don't expect anything good.
Hey, no, it doesn't need to be good, bro.
They heard about you, eh? [laughs]
translation.it: - Non canto con le telecamere. - L'hanno saputo?

translation.en: They heard about your big performance tonight.
translation.it: Hanno saputo della tua esibizione di stasera.

translation.en: [Blake] All right! All right!
Showtime!
-[singing] -[players drumming, exclaiming]
Oh, next!
All the way from England,
Lowe is here to take it.
-[player 1] One word. -[player 2] It's all we're asking for.
translation.it: - Una parola. - È ciò che chiediamo.

translation.en: [chanting] One word! Word! Word! Word!
Players only!
Remove yourself!
[Blake] The biggest challenge right now going into the World Cup qualifiers
translation.it: La sfida più grande in queste qualificazioni

translation.en: is to get this group to play as a team.
translation.it: è far giocare questo gruppo come una squadra.

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] When it's game day, I always have goosebumps.
translation.it: Il giorno della partita, ho sempre la pelle d'oca.

translation.en: I'm ready to give everything to make the team succeed.
translation.it: Darò tutto per il successo della squadra.

translation.en: [Blake in English] I get nervous sometimes.
The bigger the game, the bigger the moment.
translation.it: Più importante è la partita, più lo è il momento.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] We are live from the Luzhniki Stadium,
translation.it: Siamo in diretta dallo stadio Luzhniki,

translation.en: the mythical ground of Croatian football.
translation.it: il mitico campo del calcio croato.

translation.en: This is where we played the legendary final against the French.
translation.it: Qui abbiamo giocato la leggendaria finale contro i francesi.

translation.en: Memories that will live on forever.
The absence of captain Luka Modrić
has of course worried everyone in the national team.
translation.it: ha ovviamente preoccupato tutti in nazionale.

translation.en: [Modrić] Unfortunately, because of an injury, I couldn't be with the national team.
translation.it: Purtroppo, a causa di un infortunio, non ho potuto esserci.

translation.en: [commentator] It's clear how much of a blow his absence is for Croatia.
translation.it: È chiaro quanto la sua assenza sia un duro colpo per la Croazia.

translation.en: But as Coach Dalić said ahead of the match,
Croatia will soon have to face a future without Luka.
translation.it: la Croazia dovrà presto affrontare un futuro senza Luka.

translation.en: [Modrić] I'm aware that I'm of a certain age,
translation.it: So di avere una certa età

translation.en: and that this is my last competition with the Croatian national team.
translation.it: e che questa è la mia ultima competizione con la nazionale croata.

translation.en: Come here.
[in English] Who's playing, Sofi?
[in Croatian] Who's playing?
Who's playing?
Who's playing?
Is it Croatia? Huh?
-Croatia. -Croatia.
What do you think the score will be?
-Two-one. -Two-one.
translation.it: - Due a uno. - Due a uno.

translation.en: -[Sofia in English] Daddy! -[in Croatian] Is it a regular game?
What do you mean?
[in English] Friendly. Friendly. -Huh? -Friendly.
[in Croatian] No, these are the World Cup qualifiers.
translation.it: No, sono le qualificazioni ai Mondiali.

translation.en: -Yes. For Qatar. -Then we have to win.
translation.it: - Sì. Per il Qatar. - Allora dobbiamo vincere.

translation.en: Of course, if it were a friendly…
[in English] Sofi, we have to win.
[in Croatian] Yes, this is for the World Cup.
translation.it: Sì, è per la Coppa del Mondo.

translation.en: Who is the captain when you don't play?
-[boy] Perišić. -Perišić.
[girl] Who is the captain when Perišić or you aren't playing?
translation.it: Chi è il capitano quando Perišic o tu non giocate?

translation.en: [Modrić] Lovren or Vida.
Is Vida playing?
No, he has yellow cards, so he can't.
translation.it: Ha preso i cartellini gialli, non può.

translation.en: -Two? -Yes, two.
Was he angry?
[exhales] Yes, very.
-[in English] Give me the ball. -[Sofia] It's my ball.
translation.it: - La palla, per favore - No, è mia.

translation.en: No, it's my ball.
-[Sofia] No, it's mine. -It's my ball.
translation.it: - No, è mia. - È la mia palla.

translation.en: It's my ball, yes.
-Ema's ball. -My ball.
-[Sofia] Hey, share. -Share. Okay.
You didn't share with me. Yes, she always shares.
translation.it: - Non l'hai fatto con me. - Sì, lo fa sempre.

translation.en: [Modrić in Croatian] It's hard for me when I'm not with the national team.
translation.it: È dura quando non sono con la nazionale.

translation.en: [in French] Are we ready?
[reporter] Only five African teams will qualify for Qatar 2022.
translation.it: Solo cinque squadre africane si qualificheranno per Qatar 2022.

translation.en: Egypt are the big favorites here in Franceville.
translation.it: L'Egitto è il favorito qui a Franceville.

translation.en: Can Aubameyang's men cause an upset tonight
translation.it: Gli uomini di Aubameyang creeranno problemi

translation.en: and reignite their campaign against this talented Egypt side
translation.it: e riprenderanno la corsa contro la talentuosa squadra egiziana

translation.en: led by the incomparable Mohamed Salah?
[in English] Rock, paper, scissors, shoot!
[reporter 1 in Jamaican Patois] If Jamaica wins today,
we are back into the thick of things. Right?
translation.it: torniamo nel vivo delle cose. Giusto?

translation.en: [reporter 2] We just have to make sure that we get the ball to whoever's up top
translation.it: Dobbiamo assicurarci di portare la palla a chi è in alto

translation.en: to put into the back of the net.
Andre Blake doing his best, letting none go in.
translation.it: Blake fa del suo meglio per non far passare nessuno.

translation.en: [reporter 1 in English] Jamaica will win this game. I feel it.
[Blake] Wearing the captain's band, you can't show your teammates certain things.
translation.it: Con la fascia da capitano, non puoi mostrare certe cose ai compagni.

translation.en: They're looking to you,
so you can't show fear,
you can't show nerves.
[in Croatian] When you watch the game, are you nervous or not?
translation.it: Quando guardi la partita, sei nervoso o no?

translation.en: Are you nervous or not?
Do you think we'll win?
Sometimes.
[Modrić] When you're watching on TV, it's really nerve-racking.
translation.it: Quando la guardi in televisione, è snervante.

translation.en: You get much more nervous than when you play.
[commentator] Now the real fight starts.
translation.it: Inizia la vera battaglia. CROAZIA - 6 PUNTI RUSSIA - 6 PUNTI

translation.en: Tonight against Russia, it couldn't be harder.
translation.it: Stasera contro la Russia, è difficilissimo.

translation.en: [in French] Every ball, every minute, we give everything, boys. Everything.
translation.it: A ogni palla, ogni minuto, diamo tutto. Tutto.

translation.en: Nobody gives up.
[Blake in English] Out in eight, gents. Get yourself ready.
[man in French] Strong, guys.
[Aubameyang] Together!
Right until the end. Come on!
[Blake in Jamaican Patois] Now! Let's go!
[in French] It's a World Cup qualifier. Don't forget that. Keep it in mind.
translation.it: È una qualificazione per i Mondiali Non dimenticatelo.

translation.en: Let's give everything. We can do it. Come on!
[all chanting in Jamaican Patois] We will do! We will do! Jamaica!
translation.it: Lo faremo! Lo faremo! Lo faremo! Giamaica!

translation.en: [in French] Come on, boys!
[Blake in English] As a group, how hard are we willing to work?
translation.it: Come gruppo, quanto siamo disposti a lavorare?

translation.en: How much are we willing to suffer?
You're talking about the World Cup.
[commentator in French] Welcome to Franceville for the match
translation.it: Benvenuti a Franceville per la partita

translation.en: between the Panthers and the Pharaohs.
translation.it: tra le Pantere e i Faraoni.

translation.en: Gabon versus Egypt.
[Aubameyang] Everyone always expects the most from you.
translation.it: Tutti si aspettano il massimo da te.

translation.en: When we're in the tunnel,
it's a very special moment.
You see the pitch, and you can't wait to get out there.
translation.it: Vedi il campo e non vedi l'ora di uscire.

translation.en: [commentator] Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, the captain. The Panthers will rely on him a lot today.
translation.it: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang, il capitano. Le Pantere si affidano molto a lui.

translation.en: [Sofia in English] One, two! One, two, three!
[commentator in Croatian] Russia, our opponents tonight, are the toughest team in the group.
translation.it: La Russia, l'avversario di stasera, è la squadra più tosta del girone.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Here we go. The kick-off whistle.
[Aubameyang] I think we have a lot of potential.
I've always said it.
I think it's the best generation I've ever known.
translation.it: Credo che sia la generazione migliore che abbia mai visto.

translation.en: [commentator in English] Panama will get things underway.
translation.it: JAMAICA - PANAMA QUALIFICAZIONI NORD E CENTRO AMERICA Inizia Panama. Calciano da sinistra a destra.

translation.en: We're kicking from left to right.
translation.it: Inizia Panama. Calciano da sinistra a destra.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Without Modrić today,
Perišić accepts the task of captaincy.
Miranchuk. He's a very dangerous player.
translation.it: Miranchuk. È un giocatore molto pericoloso.

translation.en: He shoots. It's gone over the bar.
translation.it: Tira. È andato oltre la traversa.

translation.en: Close him down.
[commentator in English] Jamaica trying to build from their half.
translation.it: La Giamaica costruisce dalla propria metà.

translation.en: We're getting pushed back so deep!
[commentator] Jamaica giving away possession.
Panama on the attack, puts the play on the left-hand side
right down to Rodriguez.
A shot! And right to goalkeeper Blake, diving to his right.
translation.it: Un tiro! E il portiere Blake si tuffa alla sua destra.

translation.en: [Blake] We couldn't put five passes together.
translation.it: Non riuscivamo a fare cinque passaggi di fila.

translation.en: It was just chaotic.
[commentator] Panama on the attack. What a strike!
[Blake] There was no cohesiveness. There was no chemistry.
translation.it: Non c'era coesione, non c'era chimica.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] A chance for Croatia.
translation.it: Ecco una chance per la Croazia.

translation.en: Perišić. It wasn't a great shot. It surprised him.
translation.it: Perišic. Non è stato un gran tiro. L'ha sorpreso.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Mohamed Salah has magnificent control.
translation.it: Il controllo palla di Salah è magnifico.

translation.en: A fantastic pass there.
Now, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
A goal. No! The save from El Shenawy.
translation.it: Un goal. No! Il salvataggio di El Shenawy.

translation.en: I was sure that was a goal.
[commentator in English] Forward again. Here comes Panama. Floats the ball inside the penalty area.
translation.it: Ecco che arriva Panama. La palla dentro l'area di rigore.

translation.en: Header! Beautiful header!
translation.it: Colpo di testa! Bellissimo colpo di testa!

translation.en: [Blake] After the second goal…
[commentator] Oh my word!
[Blake] …"Am I dreaming? Is this happening for real?"
"Will somebody wake me up?"
[commentator] The visitors, they're leading by two goals to nil.
translation.it: Gli ospiti sono in vantaggio di due goal a zero.

translation.en: [commentator in French] Nil-nil between Gabon and Egypt.
translation.it: Zero a zero tra il Gabon e l'Egitto.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Croatia have had more possession but have done nothing with it.
translation.it: La Croazia ha avuto più possesso palla, ma non ha fatto niente.

translation.en: [commentator in English] Coach Tappa Whitmore of the Jamaica team has to make some changes
translation.it: Il coach della Giamaica Tappa Whitmore deve fare dei cambiamenti,

translation.en: because Panama, they're all over the Jamaicans at the present time.
translation.it: perché Panama sta dominando su tutti i giamaicani.

translation.en: [player 1] To me, I think we should start by pressing them.
translation.it: Per me, dovremmo iniziare a pressarli.

translation.en: We're at home. We're down 2-0. We need to chase the game.
translation.it: Siamo a casa. Stiamo perdendo. Dobbiamo spingere.

translation.en: We need a structure of pressing them. We go, we get picked off.
translation.it: Serve uno schema per pressarli o ci fanno fuori.

translation.en: [player 2] It's not structure. Need to change formation. We're too open in midfield.
translation.it: Non uno schema. Cambia formazione. Sei troppo aperto.

translation.en: -We need someone in the midfield. -[coach] Stop talking.
translation.it: CENTROCAMPISTA - Serve qualcuno a centrocampo. - Basta.

translation.en: Before you talk about formation, before you talk about anything, right? They're outfighting us.
translation.it: Prima di parlare di formazione, prima di parlare, ci stanno già battendo.

translation.en: They're quicker to the ball.
They are quicker to the second balls, guys.
translation.it: Sono più veloci sulle seconde palle.

translation.en: Right? We're pressing and just jogging up to the ball.
translation.it: Stiamo solo correndo fino alla palla.

translation.en: It's like a testimonial!
What is that all about? They're moving quicker than us.
translation.it: Che cosa succede? Si muovono più in fretta di noi.

translation.en: We are at home!
We are at home. You can do any formation you want.
translation.it: Siamo a casa. Potete fare qualsiasi formazione.

translation.en: They run faster, quicker than you, guess what?
translation.it: Se corrono più veloci di voi, indovinate?

translation.en: We get beat.
Come on. Come on.
[in French] We give it all until the end.
If you're tired, come off and the subs give everything too.
translation.it: Se siete stanchi, uscite e il sostituto darà il massimo.

translation.en: -We're in the game, boys. -[man] We're in the game.
We're in it.
[in English] They need to think this is a cauldron, and it's too hot.
translation.it: Devono pensare che sia un calderone e che sia troppo caldo.

translation.en: Somebody take some leadership.
Somebody just take the game by the scruff of the neck and go.
translation.it: Prendete il gioco per la collottola e andate.

translation.en: [in French] It's time to score, guys. We are hungry.
translation.it: È ora di segnare, ragazzi. Abbiamo fame.

translation.en: Come on, guys.
-[whistle blows] -[tense music plays]
[commentator] There is nothing between these two teams despite the Panthers' dominance.
translation.it: Non c'è niente tra queste due squadre, nonostante il dominio delle Pantere.

translation.en: And here we have Boupendza.
One-on-one with Mohamed El Shenawy.
translation.it: Uno contro uno con Mohamed El Shenawy.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] We had a great game, a great game, and we are rewarded.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto una bella partita e siamo stati ricompensati.

translation.en: [commentator] What's going on? What's going on?
Oh, it's a red card.
[Aubameyang] Of course, that gives us that extra energy, and it gives you hope.
translation.it: Certo, questo ci dà quell'energia in più, della speranza.

translation.en: So it was the moment to take points off them.
[in Jamaican Patois] Move up! Move up! Move up!
[in English] At 2-0, are we still in the game? At least to get a point.
translation.it: Siamo ancora in gioco sul 2-0? Almeno per fare un punto.

translation.en: I do feel, um, somewhat distant as the goalkeeper.
translation.it: Mi sento un po' distante come portiere.

translation.en: And it can be very frustrating, you know? Especially whenever I get scored on.
translation.it: E può essere molto frustrante. Specialmente quando segnano.

translation.en: [commentator] Waterman, he dances,
and beats the goalkeeper, Blake, to his left.
translation.it: e supera il portiere, alla sua sinistra.

translation.en: Oh my word.
That's cherry on the top, icing on the cake.
[Blake] That was like the dagger. That's it.
translation.it: È stata una pugnalata. Era finita.

translation.en: [commentator in Croatian] Ivanušec enters the box. Ivanušec shoots.
Man, we're five times better than them. Come on.
translation.it: Siamo cinque volte migliori di loro. Forza.

translation.en: [commentator in French] It's Obiang. One-two.
He's in the penalty area.
They shoot and they score!
The Panthers claw the Egyptian Pharaohs.
-One-zero. -[fans cheering, applauding]
[in Croatian] Clear it away.
Clear it!
What are you doing?
[commentator] Kovačić. Kovačić! What an opportunity, but it's wide.
translation.it: Kovačić. Kovačić! Che opportunità. Ma è largo.

translation.en: [commentator] If that had gone in, Croatia would be celebrating at the Luzhniki Stadium.
translation.it: Se fosse entrato, la Croazia avrebbe festeggiato.

translation.en: [commentator in English] And that signals the end of the matchup.
translation.it: E questo segna la fine dell'incontro.

translation.en: Captain Blake looks dejected.
[Blake] It could have easily been 6-0.
We didn't fight hard enough. We didn't show enough character.
translation.it: Non abbiamo lottato abbastanza. Non abbiamo mostrato carattere. GIAMAICA 0 - 3 PANAMA

translation.en: [in Croatian] Well, a point is not bad if we beat Slovakia and Slovenia.
translation.it: Beh, un punto non è male se battiamo la Slovacchia e la Slovenia.

translation.en: [Aubameyang in French] I don't think I've ever seen Gabon play so well.
translation.it: Non ho mai visto il Gabon giocare così bene.

translation.en: We started to believe.
[commentator] We're in the last minutes of this match.
The final push.
Aubameyang is full of fighting spirit.
translation.it: Aubameyang è pieno di spirito combattivo.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] It was a strange game.
[commentator] A victory here would give them a chance in the group after the defeat to Libya.
translation.it: Una vittoria darebbe loro una chance, dopo la sconfitta contro la Libia.

translation.en: [Aubameyang] At that moment, we were on the right path.
But…
you have to be focused.
Every detail counts until the last second.
translation.it: Ogni dettaglio conta fino all'ultimo secondo.

translation.en: [commentator] Attention. Watch out.
